name: The Ashen Abbey
description:
The entrance to the old abbey is visible, as the stone doors remain free from snow. Once within, it becomes clear a great blaze wracked this place. 

Something terrible slumbers here. 

The Ashen Abbey is a simple 5 room dungeon for your favourite tabletop roleplaying game.
If you want to use the illustrations in your own game,  you can purchase a license here!
